# Official branding assets for SKOR AI and its agent identities

<p align="center">
  <img src="https://camo.githubusercontent." alt="SKOR AI Agent Branding" width="380"/>
</p>

# SKOR AI Agent Media Kit

Welcome to the official media kit for **SKOR AI**. This directory is curated for partners, press contacts, and collaborators to provide easy access to our latest branding assets.

---

## 📦 What’s Included

- **Logos:** Vector and raster versions in various color schemes (light, dark, monochrome)
- **Mascots:** Official SKOR AI mascots in print and web-ready formats
- **Banners:** Pre-sized banners for social media, web, and presentations
- **Brand Guidelines:** Usage instructions, color palettes, and typography references

---

## 🎨 Brand Guidelines

To maintain the integrity of the SKOR AI brand, please refer to the included guidelines before using any assets.

**Key points:**
- Do **not** alter colors, proportions, or orientation of logos/mascots
- Use provided assets for both digital and print media
- For custom requests or clarifications, contact our media team

---

## 📁 Directory Structure

```plaintext
SKOR AI AGENT MEDIA KIT/
├── logos/
│   ├── skorai-logo-dark.svg
│   ├── skorai-logo-light.png
│   └── ...
├── mascots/
│   ├── mascot-full.png
│   └── mascot-head.svg
├── banners/
│   ├── social-banner.jpg
│   └── presentation-banner.png
├── brand-guidelines.pdf
└── README.md   ← You are here!

🤝 Attribution & Usage
All assets are © SKOR AI.
Use is permitted for press coverage, partnership announcements, and official collaborations.
Commercial or third-party use outside these contexts is prohibited without written consent.
